page.title: 12FACILITIES AT TOLMERS CAMP.
page.content: On the site at Tolmers Scout Camp we have got climbing and abseiling facilities plus a climbing wall.We have got a lake and some canoes but after a while,scouts have broken the paddles.Once every year we have a "Come to Tolmers"fortnight where Cubs, Scouts,Brownies and Guides take part in activities like, archery,first-aid, air-rifles,climbing,abseiling,rafting, canoeing,pioneering,car maintainance and site service. There are also courses in forestry,camp-cooking and pioneering,the former is a fourteen day course spread over the year, whilst the others last for fourteen continuous days. Wild life abounds in the area and all visitors are welcome providing they report to the warden on arrival.In 1985 Tolmers have been hosts to the archery events in The World Games.
